channel.title: Algebraic Geometry on pramana's blog
channel.description: Recent content in Algebraic Geometry on pramana's blog

item.title: A presheaf which is not a sheaf
item.description: I’ve been reading Ravi Vakil’s Rising Sea: Foundations of Algebraic Geometry this semester, specifically the second chapter which gives an introduction to sheaf theory. While the first half of the chapter serves to introduce the idea of a sheaf and to convince you that it makes sense geometrically to define it, I would say the meat of the chapter is defining the sheafification of a presheaf and explain how it helps us do homology on sheaves.
